As Entertainment Weekly noted, Poor girl can't even eat a cookie without causing a scene. , the singer may join Simon Cowell on the show when it begins filming later this year. "To get her on the show would give it real star power," a source told the magazine. Nicole Scherzinger and Cheryl Cole are also being considered for places on the judging panel, because they've got a proven track record of being great judges, but that doesn't rule Rihanna out. Others who have been rumoured for the show's judging panel include Will Smith , Katy Perry , Mick Jagger and Mariah Carey .

Daimler gave Chrysler managers a booklet that described the product development process- mostly in German, Sergio Marchionne said. "Three-quarters of the words in the booklet were in German," Sergio Marchionne told said in his remarks. If you think that there's no English equivalent to a word you use in German, you're nuts. Daimler, the maker of Mercedes Benz vehicles, bought Chrysler in 1998 and ultimately sold the company to Cerberus in 2007. Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed! Eric Schmidt tweeted after the announcement. Eric Schmidt , who became CEO in 2001 to bring more management experience to a then-fledgling company, will assume the role of executive chairman, focussing on deals and government outreach,

We bask in the reflected glory of this scrappy, banged-up bunch that ran the table and knocked off some pretty good teams in hostile stadiums to advance to one of the most exciting Super Bowls ever. I'll tell you what, Green Bay, we're going to be right here next year doing this exact same thing, Packers quarterback and Super Bowl MVP Aaron Rodgers said to a thunderous ovation from the crowd. Fresh from Disney World in Florida and David Letterman in New York, he declared himself "pretty tired right now."

- Microsoft Chief Executive Officer Steve Ballmer , said to unveil new software for tablets at the Consumer Electronics Show next week, will face skeptics who say his company won't soon narrow Apple's iPad lead. By the time Microsoft gets it figured out everybody will already own an iPad, said Keith Goddard , CEO of Capital Advisors Inc. an investing firm in Tulsa, Oklahoma, that holds Apple shares. "I was happy to hear that the president and I agree: The foundation of our future economy will be built on investments in higher education and in scientific research and development," said Paul Tonko . Innovation in technology and clean energy will be the keys that unlock unlimited opportunities for future generations of Americans, and allow us to maintain our status as the leader of the global economy. Allen Iverson , the NBA's Most Valuable Player in 2001, agreed to a$ 4 million, two-year deal with Besiktas after no NBA team offered him a contract. Gary Moore said Allen Iverson last played Saturday. This is the most pain he's ever felt from any injury he's had, Gary Moore said. "He's been in tremendous agony."
